page.title: 08Sennen School
page.content: Sennen School is the first and last school in England.The school building is dated in 1880 but was not opened until 3rd January 1881.The first headmaster was Mr.Job Cockcroft.At that time the school had three classrooms including a mixed one. They did not have a school kitchen so we think they must have had a packed lunch or had gone home for lunch.Our headmaster is now Mr.Cooper.The school has changed a lot since 1880 because we have now got a school kitchen and in 1980 we had a new toilet block built onto the old building. We have got three classrooms junior 1,junior 2 and infants.There is an adventure playground next to the school and we use that.There is a community centre behind the school and we do our P.E in that if we cant do it on the school field.
